    Finance

    The Finance Department is responsible for providing financial advice and support to faculties and departments, managing the University’s income and expenditure, ensuring that we get value for money in all our financial activities and that we comply with statutory and regulatory body requirements and financial best practice.

    Finance department at Ulster University

    Ulster University Finance

      ulster.ac.uk/finance
